00009   void ScintCaloSlowReadoutModBlock::setDblArrays(const ScintCaloSlowMeasuresDblMap_t& scintCaloSlowMeasuresDblMap) 
00010   {
00011 
00012 
00013     //the position variable
00014     int ipos(_startOfDoubles);
00015     //Loop over the vector with the defined types
00016     for ( ScintCaloSroTypesDblMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theDblTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theDblTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00017       //std::cout << "Type: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00018       //Extract this type from the map (if possible)
00019       ScintCaloSlowMeasuresDblMap_t::const_iterator slowmap_iter = scintCaloSlowMeasuresDblMap.find((*types_iter).first); 
00020       if( slowmap_iter != scintCaloSlowMeasuresDblMap.end() )
00021         {
00022           //Set the position and the size of this datatype
00023           setNumPos( (*types_iter).second.first, ipos , static_cast<int> ((*slowmap_iter).second.size())); 
00024           for(std::vector<double>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00025                 (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ ){
00026             //std::cout << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00027             obj()->setDoubleVal(ipos, (*thevals_iter));
00028             ipos++;
00029           }  
00030           
00031           
00032         } else std::cout << "Type " << (*types_iter).first <<" not known" << std::endl;
00033     }
00034     //set the start of the double values to the current position of the position index to allow for multiple calls of this method     
00035     _startOfDoubles=ipos;
00036   }

00070   void ScintCaloSlowReadoutModBlock::setFloatArrays(const ScintCaloSlowMeasuresFloatMap_t& scintCaloSlowMeasuresFloatMap) 
00071   {
00072     //the position variable
00073     int ipos(_startOfFloats);
00074     //Loop over the vector with the defined types
00075     for ( ScintCaloSroTypesFloatMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theFloatTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theFloatTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00076       //std::cout << "Type: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00077       //Extract this type from the map (if possible)

00079       if( slowmap_iter != scintCaloSlowMeasuresFloatMap.end() )
00080         {

00087             ipos++;
00088           }  
00089

00099   void ScintCaloSlowReadoutModBlock::prepareOutputVecs(){
00100    
00101 
00102     //Loop over the types vec for Doubles
00103     for (ScintCaloSroTypesDblMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theDblTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theDblTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00104 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00105       std::cout << "ScintCaloSlowReadoutModBlock::prepareOutputVecs Doubles: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00106       std::cout << "Position in map: " << types_iter->second.first << std::endl;
00107       std::cout << "Position in LCIO::Double Collec: " << getPos(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00108       std::cout << "Number of values: " << getNum(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00109 #endif 
00110       //Retrieve position and number of values and store these in the
00111       //output vectors
00112       //Check first whether this datatype has been written at all
00113       int pos(getPos( types_iter->second.first));
00114       int numvals(getNum(types_iter->second.first));
00115       if(pos>-1) {
00116       for(int ivals = pos; ivals < pos+numvals;ivals++)
00117         types_iter->second.second->push_back(getDoubleVal(ivals));
00118       } else std::cout << "Nothing found for Type: " << (*types_iter).first<< std::endl;        
00119     }
00120     
00121 
00122     //Loop over the types vec Ints
00123     for (ScintCaloSroTypesIntMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theIntTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theIntTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00124 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00125       std::cout << "ScintCaloSlowReadoutModBlock::prepareOutputVecs Ints: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00126       std::cout << "Position in map: " << types_iter->second.first << std::endl;
00127       std::cout << "Position in LCIO::Double Collec: " << getPos(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00128       std::cout << "Number of values: " << getNum(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00129 #endif 
00130       //Retrieve position and number of values and store these in the
00131       //output vectors
00132       //Check first whether this datatype has been written at all
00133       int pos(getPos( types_iter->second.first));
00134       int numvals(getNum(types_iter->second.first));
00135       if(pos>-1) {
00136         for(int ivals = pos; ivals < pos+numvals;ivals++)
00137           types_iter->second.second->push_back(getIntVal(ivals));
00138       } std::cout << "Nothing found for Type: " << (*types_iter).first<< std::endl;
00139     }
00140 
00141     //Loop over the types vec Floats
00142     for (ScintCaloSroTypesFloatMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theFloatTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theFloatTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00143 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00144       std::cout << "ScintCaloSlowReadoutModBlock::prepareOutputVecs Floats: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00145       std::cout << "Position in map: " << types_iter->second.first << std::endl;
00146       std::cout << "Position in LCIO::Double Collec: " << getPos(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00147       std::cout << "Number of values: " << getNum(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00148 #endif 
00149       //Retrieve position and number of values and store these in the
00150       //output vectors
00151       int pos(getPos( types_iter->second.first));
00152       int numvals(getNum(types_iter->second.first));
00153       if(pos > -1){
00154       for(int ivals = pos; ivals < pos+numvals;ivals++)
00155         types_iter->second.second->push_back(getFloatVal(ivals));
00156       }  std::cout << "Nothing found for Type: " << (*types_iter).first<< std::endl;
00157     }
00158 
00159 
00160     
00161   }
